title: SPHERE DICE VISUALS
description: Service page for a digital agency built with React and features 3D visual elements using Three.js.

title: PORTFOLIO
description: Personal portfolio project built using React, styled with Tailwind CSS, and powered by Vite. Featuring animations using `react-type-animation` and interactive UI components such as carousels with `react-slick`.

title: OFFEROASIS
description: ASP.NET API with an MSSQL database and a CI/CD workflow added via GitHub Actions. Imitates the operation of a webshop.

title: FUN WITH FLAGS
description:
UX/UI design project for a quiz game. Worked closely with the frontend developer team on the application.
